column1:
Localization files are formatted like CSV so they can be easily edited,
however formatting has strict rules for easy parsing. Most of these rules
are already handled by Excel / Libre / etc., so you don't have to worry
about them in normal usage. However, if your localization file seems to
be corrupted, these rules may be helpful for debugging purposes...
- In general, any consecutive string of \r and \n (in any order) will be
  treated as one SINGLE line break, except within an enclosed context
- The first 4 rows can be arbitrarily long
  - The first cell of first row is used to store this block of instruction
    text
  - The first 3 cells of the fourth row is used as headers
  - All other cells in the first and fourth rows are ignored
  - Columns in the second row alternate between property and value (ex.
    ' foo | 1 | bar | 3.5 | ... '
    - Any whitespaces before and after the property name are ignored
  - Columns in the third row are exclusively comments for properties in the
    second row
- Every following line can include any number of cells, but only the
  first three will be parsed (you can use the rest as comments if needed)
- The file must end in a sequence of \r and \n's
- Every cell containing a ^, \r, or \n must be enclosed in "
  - If a " is encountered right after a non-enclosed separator, \r, or \n,
    then the parser is said to enter an "enclosed context", such context
    ends immediately when a non-escaped " that is not followed by \r, \n,
    or a separator is encountered
  - " within each cell should be escaped using another " in front of it,
  - If a " is encountered in a non-enclosed context, and it is not right
    after a separator, \r, or \n, then it is entirely ignored
  - If a non-escaped " is encountered in an enclosed context...
    - If it is followed by a separator, \r, or \n, then it is considered
      the closing quote of the current context
    - Otherwise, it is ignored
  - If a separator, \r, or \n is encountered while in an enclosed context,
    it will be preserved
Set to 1 allow the parser to read this file, otherwise it will be skipped and the default English localization will be used as fallback
column3: Float value that scales font size of all dialogue text, this is an option separate because the English font of this game is *really* tiny, like about 1/3 of regular font when under the same font size.
column5: Float value that scales font size of all dialogue text, this is an option separate because the English font of this game is *really* tiny, like about 1/3 of regular font when under the same font size. Recommended setting is around 0.3~0.6.

Hey what are you- wait, you're the person with all the magical artifacts!
Perfect! You have that <#2e44f0>Anchor</color>, right? I've been writing my thesis on how it affects time and space!
This... this is it! A <#c060c0><wavy>desync</wavy></color>!
These <#c060c0><wavy>desyncs</wavy></color> are so fascinating, they break all rules we know.
They're just letting anyone in these days, huh?
We found some extremely long-chinned man in the past, but he's clearly from the modern age.
All this past and present is so confusing.
Moving objects locally doesn't matter... only the complete removal of them.
Destroy the rocks? Rig up explosives and use the laser!
Watch 'em go kaBOOM!
Erm...
Hope the next one's better...
There're some real funny fellas 'round here, huh.
Think any of 'em know explosion magic?
Oh, you're wondering why it didn't explode?
I've been preparing this just for you.
Check it!
That was cool!! Right?!
Right..?
Our super-laser packs quite a punch! We're running some tests on it's power.
Can you get me some oil so I can verify it's impact?
Wow! Lasers are so cool!!
Haha don't worry, this time I'm going all out!
Ready?
Boom.
What? You want more?
For Todd.
Well... let's just say I got plans I can NOT share right now.
This <wavy>idiot</wavy> insinuated I was too short to be a wizard!
A DUEL will settle this finely.
Hand me that Shield Generator, and his spells will be null against me.
He'll stand no chance! Hahaha!
Drat... I'm back on his level.
Get me back my Shield! I can regain the advantage then.
aHA! Who's too short now?
You stand no chance against this fireball!
Now we're on even footing! And it seems we've reached an stalemate...
What say we call it a truce.
Perhaps fire and lightning aren't so different after all.
These kerfuffles are truly brash aren't they?
I propose we team up! Knowledge is the true sign of class.
These kerfuffles are truly brash aren't they?
Knowledge is the true sign of class. Let us team up!
These kerfuffles are truly brash aren't they?
Knowledge is the true sign of class. Let us team up!
I just said what that girl at the bar said.
Uh oh, lil bro is upset.
I'm not gonna win this fight if he has the Shield Generator.
Woah, I'm toast without protection.
Is it getting hot in here or is that just me?
Ha! You can't get me anymore!
Now perish before my lightning spell!
Damn you! Now I'll never win this battle. Perhaps the time has come for a new approach.
A truce it is!
Now that you say it, our combined powers would be unstoppable!
Fret not my new friend. With our efforts combined, we will pave the way for fire and lightning.
Fret not my new friend. With our efforts combined, we will pave the way for fire and lightning.
Fret not my new friend. With our efforts combined, we will pave the way for fire and lightning.
Two wizards once had a legendary duel here during the height of the wizarding era.
Unfortunately they killed each other during the fight.
Imagine what they could have done together, with the power of friendship!
This Shield Generator is a relic from that duel.
And here is where I would have room for something like a gem... if I had one.
And here is where I would have room for something like a gem... if I had one.
That would be so terrible if I had a gem. I only have one rope.
Man it would really suck if I had a gem. The absoute worst.
Behold! The Fire gem. (Don't touch it.)
It was created by the short wizard after he won the duel!
I will say, I don't know what I would do if the gem were any bigger or more powerful.
It would really suck cause I wouldn't be able to fit it that would be terrible.
Behold! The Lightning gem. (Don't touch it)
It was created by the lightning wizard after he won the duel!
I will say, I don't know what I would do if the gem were any bigger or more powerful.
It would really suck cause I wouldn't be able to fit it that would be terrible.
Tall and small, joining powers! Who would have thought?
In fact, the gem the made is so big I can't even rope it off!
Anyways, it's brought in more visitors. Take this as thanks.
Tall and small, joining powers! Who would have thought?
In fact, the gem the made is so big I can't even rope it off!
Anyways, it's brought in more visitors. Take this as thanks.
Business is booming.
Hey, where'd the gem go?
I knew I should've bought insurance.
What have I done to deserve this? Is there no justice in this cruel and uncaring world?
Hear thee, hear thee! I introduce to you... the Burger! Allow me to show you its juicy deliciousness!
Wait, where are you going with that? Oh my days, someone help me!
Wait, that's not my burger. Where did you get that?
My castle has gone missing! Good heavens what sorcery is this?
Ahhh! Where did all those mushrooms come from? Did I botch the spell that badly?
Broken bridge, dissapearing castle, mushrooms everywhere, oh is there no end to this madness?
I sense something. Is that.. the castle? Could it be?
But these stupid fungi are still in my way.
Aha! I knew my castle was nearby
But I can't fix the bridge. There's still... mushrooms in the way
It's like they're... sucking away my power. What foul and heinous creations!
They're gone! Gone at last!
But... my castle. Oh where has my castle gone?
My castle! My beautiful, mushroomless castle!
Oh what a wonderful day this is! My power has returned at last!
One bridge made, coated with anti-shroomness...one less black market for me.
Who lived in that castle again?
I would kill for a second burger right now. The cafeteria lady is so stingy!
Speaking of, I heard the first burger was created and eaten at this very spot!
Wait... what happened to my burger?
Oh my delicousness, I will never let you go again!
It seems as though this is some sort of... magical burger. It looks a little old, but it will do.
But even a magic burger is just a burger. What I would do for a second burger, magical or not...
Hey! Where are you taking my burger!
Is that burger... glowing?
Two burgers? Just for me?
However, wherever, whenever this is possible, thank you chap.
Take some contraband I found on the job.
So.... full...
Yummy hammburbgeres
I'm getting kind of hungry again.
Do you think they'd ever let me have a third hamburger?

Wow! Do you think we'll grow up to be wizards too? Dueling you would be so much fun!
Sometimes I wonder if we deserve magic. All that power, yet you wonder if we're doing the right thing.
Have you heard? There was a duel earlier! My Mom said it was a tie.
My husband's a wizard! I'm so proud of him, even though it doesn't always pay the bills...
I went to the burger unveiling, but some ruffian stole it! That dastardly criminal should pay for his crimes.
Ah yes, the crystal, one of my most prized possessions. Can you have it? For a price...
Of $1,000,000! Good luck coming up with that money, chump!
Some wizards say you shall not pass. But money is money.
The time has come to ponder.
If you wish true power, you must forgo what is most valuable.
Then, you may attain what you need.
<wavy>Welcome to the Reflection Pool.</wavy>
<wavy>Before you proceed, you must fix this world one last time.</wavy>
<wavy>Welcome to the Reflection Pool.</wavy>
<wavy>You desire... <var>Cat</var>.</wavy>
<wavy>Though I do not have what you seek, I have the path forward.</wavy>
<wavy>If you wish for <var>Cat</var>, then leave the Artifact here.</wavy>
<wavy>You have done this world a great service.</wavy>
<wavy>Goodbye, adventurer. May we one day meet again.</wavy>

All of the gems are here! Let's get the Gem Fuel pumping!

These were remenants of the first ancient asteroid. You can have it!
I'll have to keep investigating this modern tech.
I heard they had a super giant laser too.
Say Barry, it's a fine day at the Magic Research Institute isn't it?
